turns.text: Okay uh so what do you think about the school system
turns.label: o

turns.text: Well I think theyre theyre having lot of trouble right now I know my son goes to private school but uh I think theyre big city public schools by definition are having tough time right now just from uh probably from budget cuts and and everything else going on
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Uh why did you choose private school
turns.label: qw

turns.text: Well I had one that was needed to be able to be moved along at at pace little faster than he was going to be able to be moved in public school so --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- hes he has been going to private since kindergarten
Then how does he like it
turns.label: qo

turns.text: Oh hes loved it He is senior in high school this year so --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- hes been there all the time
Yeah hes done it the whole twelve and uh so many years and its been uh its been really good for him
turns.label: ny

turns.text: How big of school is it
turns.label: qw

turns.text: Uh overall on campus about twelve hundred but in the upper school upper four grades uh about four hundred and something so its maybe hundred per grade
turns.label: sd

turns.text: hundred per grade thats good size
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Kind of gives them the you know - I get little leery of the real small ones that they dont get much interaction with kids but uh -
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Yeah that was we were kind of looking for one that would be mixture and --
turns.label: aa

turns.text: -- really well and just he was just ahead at an early age and I didnt feel like uh in what was available particularly in the first three grades --
-- and even in the fourth grade where they started what they called reach was still pull out one day program
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And I just didnt think that was going get it I thought he needed to be exposed to situation where he could push ahead uh every day
turns.label: sd

turns.text: But yet still be with his peers --
Right Uh one thing I think Ive noticed is uh my oldest is in kindergarten so Im in little different --
turns.label: b

turns.text: Im just starting her but uh seems to me that uh kids these days uh can really get away with murder and the teachers dont have as much arent respected as much and uh they have to be so careful of the things they do and say
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- little nervous that uh students dont seem to show that respect and -
We wouldnt have thought of crossing teacher when we --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Wouldnt have thought of it and --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: -- and theyll stand there now with them toe to toe and -

And uh the things they can say and do to teacher and they do from what I understand uh I think thats wrong I think we need to get back to the show some respect and course I guess the teacher used to warrant that but -
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Yeah but lot of times its not being taught in the home --
turns.label: aa

turns.text: -- anymore like it used to be basic respect for --
-- and adults and particularly in in responsible positions have not uh I dont think have had that basic upbringing in lot of cases and so then you wind up with little brats on your hands
Well how do you think that thats happened You think our societys just uh stopped talking out or this uh --
turns.label: qo

turns.text: -- generations just kind of changed little bit uh
Well the world changes so I mean obviously kids are not the same now as they used to be
turns.label: sv

turns.text: I mean theyre exposed to whole lot more things They have whole lot more uh variety of things they theyre that they see and do at an earlier age so life is not maybe as simple as it was at one time but but still I think it goes back to commitment by the parents to to teach uh basic values and basic uh respectful of uh -ness of authority
turns.label: sv

turns.text: And I just dont think that this --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: No I mean I remember uh well it was big thing when they let girls wear Levis We used to have to wear --

Because it was mini skirt time back there at one time
